title: Consolidate terminology to use 'Task' consistently throughout the codebase
description: Replace all instances of 'issue', 'ticket', and inconsistent 'task' usage with standardized 'Task' terminology across code, tests, documentation, UI text, and API names. This affects README, package.json commands, code comments, test descriptions, and user-facing strings.

acceptance_criteria.text: Update README.md to use 'Task' consistently instead of 'issue' and 'ticket'
Update package.json command names from 'Ticket' to 'Task'
Update all UI text and component strings to use 'Task' terminology
Update code comments, variable names, and function names to use 'Task' terminology
Update test descriptions and API/tool names to use 'Task' terminology
